name: E-notes (MERN)
desc: e-Notes, a modern note-taking app, lets you easily create, read, update, and delete notes. Enjoy features like archiving, pinning notes for quick access, and customizing backgrounds. Built with Vite + TypeScript + MERN. Styled with Chakra UI and Tailwind CSS, state managed with RTK.
